summary.span: 实现 Berkeley 套接字接口。

span.span: Implements the Berkeley sockets interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组丰富的网络通信方法和属性。The class provides a rich set of methods and properties for network communications. 类允许使用枚举中列出的任何通信协议执行同步和异步数据传输。 The class allows you to perform both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer using any of the communication protocols listed in the enumeration. 类遵循异步方法的 .NET Framework 命名模式。The class follows the .NET Framework naming pattern for asynchronous methods. 例如, 同步方法对应于异步和方法。For example, the synchronous method corresponds to the asynchronous and methods. 如果应用程序在执行过程中只需要一个线程, 请使用以下方法, 这些方法是为同步操作模式设计的。If your application only requires one thread during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for synchronous operation mode. - 如果使用面向连接的协议 (例如 TCP), 则服务器可以使用方法侦听连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, your server can listen for connections using the method. 方法处理任何传入的连接请求, 并返回可用于与远程主机通信数据的。 The method processes any incoming connection requests and returns a that you can use to communicate data with the remote host. 使用此返回的调用或方法。Use this returned to call the or method. 如果要指定本地 IP 地址和端口号, 请在调用方法之前调用方法。Call the method prior to calling the method if you want to specify the local IP address and port number. 如果希望基础服务提供商为你分配一个可用端口, 请使用端口号零。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to assign a free port for you. 如果要连接到侦听主机, 请调用方法。If you want to connect to a listening host, call the method. 若要传递数据, 请调用或方法。To communicate data, call the or method. - 如果使用的是无连接协议 (如 UDP), 则无需侦听连接。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not need to listen for connections at all. 调用方法以接受任何传入的数据报。Call the method to accept any incoming datagrams. 使用方法将数据报发送到远程主机。Use the method to send datagrams to a remote host. 若要在执行过程中使用单独的线程来处理通信, 请使用以下方法, 这些方法是为异步操作模式设计的。To process communications using separate threads during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for asynchronous operation mode. - 如果使用面向连接的协议 (如 TCP), 请使用、 和方法连接侦听主机。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, use the , , and methods to connect with a listening host. 使用和或和方法以异步方式传递数据。Use the and or and methods to communicate data asynchronously. 可以使用和处理传入连接请求。Incoming connection requests can be processed using and . - 如果你使用的是无连接协议 (如 UDP), 则可以使用和来发送数据报, 并使用和来接收数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you can use and to send datagrams, and and to receive datagrams. 如果对套接字执行多个异步操作, 则这些操作不一定按启动顺序完成。If you perform multiple asynchronous operations on a socket, they do not necessarily complete in the order in which they are started. 完成发送和接收数据的操作后, 请使用方法禁用。When you are finished sending and receiving data, use the method to disable the . 调用后, 调用方法以释放与关联的所有资源。After calling , call the method to release all resources associated with the . 通过类, 可以使用方法来配置。 The class allows you to configure your using the method. 使用方法检索这些设置。Retrieve these settings using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你正在编写一个相对简单的应用程序, 并且不需要最佳性能, 请考虑使用、和。If you are writing a relatively simple application and do not require maximum performance, consider using , , and . 这些类为通信提供更简单、更易于用户使用的界面。These classes provide a simpler and more user-friendly interface to communications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将数据发送到 HTTP 服务器并接收响应。The following code example shows how the class can be used to send data to an HTTP server and receive the response. 在收到整个页面之前, 此示例将会阻止。This example blocks until the entire page is received. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CPP/socket.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CS/socket.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/VB/socket.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多次调用构造函数并将同一字节数组作为每次调用的参数, 则将创建具有相同基础套接字的多个托管。If you call the constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed s with the same underlying socket. 强烈建议您不要这样做。This practice is strongly discouraged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数指定类的类型, `protocolType`参数指定所使用的协议。 `socketType`The `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 这两个参数不是独立的。The two parameters are not independent. 通常, 类型在协议中是隐式的。Often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果类型类型和协议类型的组合导致无效 , 则此构造函数引发。If the combination of type and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果此构造函数引发, 则使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `socketType` `protocolType` 参数指定类使用的寻址方案, 参数指定类的类型, 参数指定所使用的协议。 `addressFamily`The `addressFamily` parameter specifies the addressing scheme that the class uses, the `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class, and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 这三个参数不是独立的。The three parameters are not independent. 某些地址族限制可与它们一起使用的协议, 而类型通常是协议中的隐式。Some address families restrict which protocols can be used with them, and often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果地址族、 类型和协议类型的组合导致无效 , 则此构造函数会引发。If the combination of address family, type, and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果此构造函数引发, 则使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建类的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Socket_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从侦听套接字的连接请求队列中同步提取第一个挂起的连接请求, 然后创建并返回一个新的。 synchronously extracts the first pending connection request from the connection request queue of the listening socket, and then creates and returns a new . 不能使用此返回的来接受连接队列中的任何其他连接。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 但是, 可以调用返回的的方法来识别远程主机的网络地址和端口号。However, you can call the method of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. 在阻止模式下 , 阻止传入连接尝试排队。In blocking mode, blocks until an incoming connection attempt is queued. 连接被接受后, 原始将继续排队传入连接请求, 直到你将其关闭。Once a connection is accepted, the original continues queuing incoming connection requests until you close it. 如果使用非阻塞调用此方法, 并且没有连接请求排队, 则会引发。If you call this method using a non-blocking , and no connection requests are queued, throws a . 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在调用方法之前, 必须先调用方法来侦听传入连接请求并对其进行排队。Before calling the method, you must first call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例接受简单连接。The following code example accepts a simple connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面向连接的协议可以使用方法异步处理传入的连接尝试。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 异步接受连接使你能够在单独的执行线程中发送和接收数据。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 在调用方法之前, 必须调用方法以侦听传入连接请求并对其进行排队。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 若要在完成时收到通知, 您必须创建一个回调方法, 用于\<实现 EventHandler SocketAsyncEventArgs > 委托, 并将其挂钩到事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and hook it to the event. 对象上的下列属性和事件是必需的:The following properties and events on the object are required: - 调用方可以选择指定 要用于传入连接的现有, 方法是指定要与属性一起使用的。The caller can optionally specify an existing to use for the incoming connection by specifying the to use with the property. 如果属性为 null, 则使用与当前相同的、和来构造新的,并将设置为属性。 If the property is null, a new is constructed with the same , , and as the current and set as the property. 调用方可以在 调用方法之前将属性设置为所需的任何用户状态对象, 以便可以在回调方法中检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象更多的信息, 则可以创建一个小类, 以将其他所需的状态信息保存为成员。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. (可选) 可以在方法成功后, 提供缓冲区来接收套接字上的初始数据块。Optionally, a buffer may be provided in which to receive the initial block of data on the socket after the method succeeds. 在这种情况下 , 需要将属性设置为包含要接收数据的缓冲区 , 并且需要将属性设置为要在缓冲区中接收的数据的最大字节数。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to receive and the property needs to be set to the maximum number of bytes of data to receive in the buffer. 可以使用方法设置这些属性。These properties can be set using the method. 传入的缓冲区部分将在内部使用, 供基础 Winsock AcceptEx 调用使用。Part of the buffer passed in will be consumed internally for use by the underlying Winsock AcceptEx call. 这意味着返回的数据量将始终小于提供的 实例的属性值。This means that the amount of data returned will always be less than the value of the property on the instance provided. 基于套接字的地址族, 在内部使用的缓冲区量会有所不同。The amount of the buffer used internally varies based on the address family of the socket. 所需的最小缓冲区大小为288个字节。The minimum buffer size required is 288 bytes. 如果指定较大的缓冲区大小, 则将期望一些额外的数据 (而不是 Winsock AcceptEx 调用接收到的地址数据), 并将等待, 直到收到此额外的数据。If a larger buffer size is specified, then the will expect some extra data other than the address data received by the Winsock AcceptEx call and will wait until this extra data is received. 如果发生超时, 则会重置连接。If a timeout occurs, the connection is reset. 因此, 如果特定金额需要额外数据, 则应将缓冲区大小设置为最小缓冲区大小加上此量。So if extra data is expected of a specific amount, then the buffer size should be set to the minimum buffer size plus this amount. 完成回调方法应检查属性, 以确定操作是否成功。The completion callback method should examine the property to determine if the operation was successful. 在某些情况下, 如果未接受连接并且使属性设置为, 则可能发生此事件。The event can occur in some cases when no connection has been accepted and cause the property to be set to . 这种情况可能是通过使用半开放式 SYN 类型扫描 (SYN > SYN-ACK-> RST 序列) 进行端口扫描引起的。This can occur as a result of port scanning using a half-open SYN type scan (a SYN -> SYN-ACK -> RST sequence). 应准备使用方法的应用程序来处理这种情况。Applications using the method should be prepared to handle this condition.

member this.Available : int

summary.span: 获取已经从网络接收且可供读取的数据量。

span.span: Gets the amount of data that has been received from the network and is available to be read.

value.span: 从网络接收的、可供读取的数据的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes of data received from the network and available to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用的是非阻塞方法, 则在调用之前确定数据是否排队等待读取。If you are using a non-blocking , is a good way to determine whether data is queued for reading, before calling . 可用数据是要读取的网络缓冲区中排队的数据总量。The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading. 如果网络缓冲区中没有数据排队, 则返回0。If no data is queued in the network buffer, returns 0. 如果远程主机关闭或关闭连接, 则可能会引发。If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, can throw a . 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将调用 IOControl 和 FIONREAD 以及可用属性的结果进行比较。The following code example compares the results of calling IOControl with FIONREAD and the Available property. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketIoControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketIoControl/CPP/iocontrolserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketIoControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketIoControl/CS/iocontrolserver.cs#1)]

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作来接受一个传入的连接尝试。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to accept an incoming connection attempt.

returns.span: 一个 ，它引用异步 创建。

span.span: An that references the asynchronous creation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面向连接的协议可以使用方法异步处理传入的连接尝试。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 异步接受连接使你能够在单独的执行线程中发送和接收数据。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 在调用方法之前, 必须调用方法以侦听传入连接请求并对其进行排队。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 您必须创建一个实现委托的回调方法, 并将其名称传递给方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此, 必须至少通过 `state`参数将侦听对象传递给 。To do this, at the very minimum, you must pass the listening object to through the `state` parameter. 如果回调需要更多的信息, 可以创建一个小类来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 通过参数将此类的一个实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统通常使用单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在检索到挂起的连接之前将其阻止。When your application calls , the system usually uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method and blocks on until a pending connection is retrieved. 将返回一个新的对象, 该对象可用于发送和接收与远程主机的数据。 will return a new object that you can use to send and receive data with the remote host. 不能使用此返回的来接受连接队列中的任何其他连接。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 如果希望在调用方法后原始线程会被阻止, 请使用。 If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 当你希望原始线程继续执行时, 请在回调方法中调用的 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 系统还可以使用调用线程调用回调方法。The system may also use the calling thread to invoke the callback method. 在这种情况下 , 返回的上的属性将设置为指示该方法已同步完成。In this case, the property on the returned will be set to indicate that the method completed synchronously. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 若要取消挂起的方法调用, 请关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 如果在异步操作过程中调用 方法,则会调用向方法提供的回调。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 对方法的后续调用将引发, 以指示该操作已取消。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用返回的的属性来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。You can use the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试异步接收传入连接。The following code example attempts to receive an incoming connection asynchronously. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#2)]

example, the socket accepts the initial 10 bytes of data and the `acceptSocket` parameter is `null`, which forces the method to create the accepted socket. 回调委托将接收的字节数和数据显示在控制台上。The number of bytes received and the data are displayed on the console by the callback delegate. 有关如何接收剩余数据的说明, 请参阅。See for a description of how the remaining data is received. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则该方法将启动`remoteEP`与参数的连接的异步请求。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the `remoteEP` parameter. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则会建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 使用异步方式连接或设置默认远程主机使你能够在单独的执行线程中发送和接收数据。Connecting or setting the default remote host asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建一个实现委托的回调方法, 并将其名称传递给方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 在极少数情况下, 必须通过 `state`参数将传递给。At the very minimum, you must pass the to through the `state` parameter. 如果回调需要更多的信息, 可以创建一个小类来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 通过参数将此类的一个实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在 连接成功或引发异常前阻止。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the connects successfully or throws an exception. 如果希望在调用方法后原始线程会被阻止, 请使用。 If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 当你希望原始线程继续执行时, 请在回调方法中调用的 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果使用的是无连接协议 (如 UDP), 则在发送和接收数据之前无需调用。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 您可以使用和来与远程主机通信。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果调用了, 则从指定的默认值以外的地址到达的任何数据报都将被丢弃。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果要将默认远程主机设置为广播地址, 则必须先调用并将广播设置为。 `true`If you wish to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果无法这样做 , 则将引发。If you cannot, will throw a . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 且在调用 之前未调用, 则基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则在调用或方法之前, 服务提供程序将不会分配本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you call the or method. 如果要更改默认远程主机, 请与所需的终结点再次调用方法。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 若要取消挂起的方法调用, 请关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 如果在异步操作过程中调用 方法,则会调用向方法提供的回调。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 对方法的后续调用将引发, 以指示该操作已取消。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果此套接字以前已断开连接, 则必须在操作完成之前, 将不会退出的线程上调用。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 这是底层提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动异步连接尝试。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection attempt. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始一个对远程主机连接的异步请求。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.

summary.span: 主机由主机名和端口号指定。

span.span: The host is specified by a host name and a port number.

returns.span: 引用异步连接的 。

span.span: An that references the asynchronous connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过 调用方法完成异步操作。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常, 方法由`requestCallback`委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 在操作完成之前, 此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止, 请使用方法重载之一。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起的方法调用, 请关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 如果在异步操作过程中调用 方法,则会调用向方法提供的回调。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 对方法的后续调用将引发, 以指示该操作已取消。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息, 请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果此套接字以前已断开连接, 则必须在操作完成之前, 将不会退出的线程上调用。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 这是底层提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. 使用的也必须不同。Also the that is used must be different. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动异步连接尝试。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection attempt. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CPP/beginconnect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CS/beginconnect.cs#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CPP/beginconnect.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CS/beginconnect.cs#3)]

summary.span: 开始异步请求从远程终结点断开连接。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request to disconnect from a remote endpoint.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它引用异步操作。

span.span: An object that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则可以调用方法从远程终结点请求断开连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can call the method to request a disconnect from a remote endpoint. 如果`reuseSocket` 为`true`, 则可以重复使用套接字。If `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket. 方法使用单独的线程来调用指定的回调方法。The method uses a separate thread to invoke the specified callback method. 方法会一直阻止, 直到挂起的断开连接完成。The method blocks until the pending disconnect is complete. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果收到异常, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例为异步通信创建套接字, 并将一些数据发送到远程主机。The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 发送数据时, 将调用以停止发送和接收活动。When the data has been sent, is called to stop the send and receive activity. 然后调用以开始断开连接请求。Then is called to begin a disconnect request. 请求完成后, 将查询属性以测试套接字是否已断开连接。When the request completes, the property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected. [!code-cpp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过 调用方法完成异步操作。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常, 方法由`callback`委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 在操作完成之前, 此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止, 请使用方法重载之一。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起的, 请调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息, 请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 给定线程启动的所有 i/o 都将在该线程退出时取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果线程在操作完成之前退出, 则挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state`是用户定义的类的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过 调用方法完成异步操作。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常, 方法由`callback`委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 在操作完成之前, 此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止, 请使用方法重载之一。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起的, 请调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息, 请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 给定线程启动的所有 i/o 都将在该线程退出时取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果线程在操作完成之前退出, 则挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state`是用户定义的类的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例开始从连接的异步接收数据。The following code example begins to asynchronously receive data from a connected . [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#11)] [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#7)] [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从远程主机异步读取无连接的数据报。The method starts asynchronously reading connectionless datagrams from a remote host. 调用方法使你能够在单独的执行线程中接收数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建一个实现委托的回调方法, 并将其名称传递给方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此, 你`state`的参数至少必须包含用于通信的已连接或默认值。 To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要更多的信息, 可以创建一个小类来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 通过参数将此类的一个实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并且它将在 读取数据或引发异常之前阻塞。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and it will block on until the reads data or throws an exception. 如果希望在调用方法后原始线程会被阻止, 请使用。 If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 如果希望原始线程继续执行, 请在回调方法中的 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 上调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 在调用之前, 必须使用方法将显式绑定到本地终结点, 否则将引发。Before calling , you must explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method, or will throw a . 此方法将`buffer`数据读入参数, 并捕获从其发送数据的远程主机终结点。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent. 有关如何检索此终结点的信息, 请参阅。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 如果打算从未知主机或多台主机异步接收无连接的数据报, 此方法非常有用。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. 在这些情况下 , 将读取接收到本地网络缓冲区中的第一个排队数据报。In these cases, will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer. 如果接收的`buffer`数据报大于大小, 则该方法将尽可能多地填充`buffer` 消息, 并引发。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a . 如果使用的是不可靠的协议, 则过量的数据将丢失。If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost. 如果你使用的是可靠协议, 则该服务提供程序将保留多余的数据, 并且你可以通过使用足够大的缓冲区调用方法来检索这些数据。If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the method with a large enough buffer. 为了保证始终返回远程主机终结点 , 应用程序应使用方法将显式绑定到本地终结点, 然后`optionLevel`调用方法, 并将参数设置为。 `optionValue` 或者根据需要, 将参数设置为,并将参数设置为,以便在调用方法之前启用此选项。`optionName` To guarantee that the remote host endpoint is always returned, an application should explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method and then call the method with the `optionLevel` parameter set to or as appropriate, the `optionName` parameter set to , and the `optionValue` parameter to enable this option before calling the method. 否则, 如果发送方在接收方调用方法之前发送了大量的数据报, 则不会返回远程主机终结点。Otherwise, it is possible for the remote host endpoint to not be returned when the sender has sent a number of datagrams before the receiver has called the method. 尽管适用于无连接协议, 但你也可以使用面向连接的协议。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果选择这样做, 则必须先通过调用 / 方法建立远程主机连接, 或通过调用或方法接受传入的连接请求。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the / method or accept an incoming connection request by calling the or method. 如果在建立或接受连接之前调用方法, 将会收到。If you call the method before establishing or accepting a connection, you will get a . 还可以在调用方法之前, 为无连接协议建立默认远程主机。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在这两种情况下, 方法将`remoteEP`忽略参数, 并仅从已连接或默认的远程主机接收数据。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 使用面向连接的套接字时, 将读取与`size`参数指定的字节数最多的可用数据。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 若要取消挂起的, 请调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从远程主机异步接收无连接的数据报。The following code example asynchronously receives connectionless datagrams from a remote host. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#41)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过调用方法完成异步接收操作。The asynchronous receive operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常, 方法由`asyncCallback`委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 在操作完成之前, 此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止, 请使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 若要取消挂起的, 请调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息, 请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 此方法将`buffer`数据读入参数, 并捕获从其发送数据的远程主机终结点以及有关已接收数据包的信息。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent, as well as information about the received packet. 有关如何检索此终结点的信息, 请参阅。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 如果打算从未知主机或多台主机异步接收无连接的数据报, 此方法非常有用。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对、 、或方法中建立的远程主机启动异步发送操作。 The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or method. 如果你不首先调用、、或, 将引发异常。 will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建一个实现委托的回调方法, 并将其名称传递给方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此, 你`state`的参数至少必须包含用于通信的已连接或默认值。 To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要更多的信息, 可以创建一个小型类或结构来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 通过参数将此类的一个实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在 发送请求的字节数或引发异常之前阻止。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果希望在调用方法后原始线程会被阻止, 请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 如果希望原始线程继续执行, 请在回调方法中的 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 上调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 尽管适用于面向连接的协议, 但也适用于无连接协议, 前提是你首先调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果你使用的是无连接协议并且打算将数据发送到多个不同的主机, 则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 还可以在调用之前更改默认远程主机, 方法是调用或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 对于无连接协议, 还必须确保缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标志`socketflags`作为参数, 则不会路由要发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 给定线程启动的所有 i/o 都将在该线程退出时取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果线程在操作完成之前退出, 则挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state`是用户定义的类的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 尽管适用于面向连接的协议, 但也适用于无连接协议, 前提是你首先调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果你使用的是无连接协议并且打算将数据发送到多个不同的主机, 则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 还可以在调用之前更改默认远程主机, 方法是调用或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 对于无连接协议, 还必须确保缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标志`socketflags`作为参数, 则不会路由要发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 给定线程启动的所有 i/o 都将在该线程退出时取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果线程在操作完成之前退出, 则挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state`是用户定义的类的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

exception if you do not first call , , , or . 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建一个实现委托的回调方法, 并将其名称传递给方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此, 你`state`的参数至少必须包含用于通信的已连接或默认值。 To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要更多的信息, 可以创建一个小型类或结构来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 通过参数将此类的一个实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在 发送请求的字节数或引发异常之前阻止。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果希望在调用方法后原始线程会被阻止, 请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 如果希望原始线程继续执行, 请在回调方法中的 remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载将文件`fileName`发送到连接的套接字。This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket. 如果`fileName`位于本地目录中, 则只能用文件的名称进行标识; 否则, 必须指定文件的完整路径和名称。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 通配符 (".。。\\\\\\\\\myfile.txt ") 和 UNC 共享名称 (" \shared directory \myfile.txt ")。 \\Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果找不到该文件, 则会引发异常。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. 此方法使用在`TransmitFile` Windows socket 2 API 中找到的函数。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 有关`TransmitFile`函数及其标志的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows 套接字](/windows/desktop/WinSock/)文档。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the [Windows Sockets](/windows/desktop/WinSock/) documentation. 方法对、 、或方法中建立的远程主机启动异步发送操作。 The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the ,, , or methods. 如果你不首先调用、、或, 则会引发异常。 throws an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送文件。Calling the method enables you to send a file within a separate execution thread. 若要完成此操作, 可以创建一个由委托参数调用的回调方法。To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate parameter. 为此, 此`state`参数至少必须包含用于通信的对象。To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the object being used for communication. 如果回调需要更多信息, 你可以创建一个类或结构来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 通过参数将此自定义对象的实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this custom object to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法必须调用方法。Your callback method must invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在发送整个文件或引发异常前阻止。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the entire file or throws an exception. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 尽管适用于面向连接的协议, 但也适用于无连接协议, 前提是你首先调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 在无连接协议的情况下, 必须确保文件大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不发送数据报并 引发异常。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到异常, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并连接套接字以进行异步通信。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication. 首先, 将文件 "text .txt" 异步发送到远程主机。First, the file "text.txt" is sent asynchronously to the remote host. 回调委托调用来完成传输。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketEnhancements#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketEnhancements#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载要求要发送的文件的名称和值的按位组合。This overload requires the name of the file you want to send and a bitwise combination of values. `preBuffer`参数包含要在文件之前的任何数据。The `preBuffer` parameter contains any data you want to precede the file. `postBuffer`包含要跟踪文件的数据。`postBuffer` contains data you want to follow the file. 如果`fileName`位于本地目录中, 则只能用文件的名称进行标识; 否则, 必须指定文件的完整路径和名称。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 通配符 (".。。\\\\\\\\\myfile.txt ") 和 UNC 共享名称 (" \shared directory \myfile.txt ")。 \\Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果找不到该文件, 则会引发异常。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. `flags`参数为窗口套接字服务提供程序提供有关文件传输的其他信息。The `flags` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the file transfer. 有关如何使用此参数的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 此方法使用在`TransmitFile` Windows socket 2 API 中找到的函数。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 有关`TransmitFile`函数及其标志的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows 套接字](/windows/desktop/WinSock/)文档。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the [Windows Sockets](/windows/desktop/WinSock/) documentation. 方法对、 、或方法中建立的远程主机启动异步发送操作。 The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or methods. 如果你不首先调用、、或, 则会引发异常。 throws an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送文件。Calling the method gives you the ability to send a file within a separate execution thread. 若要完成此操作, 可以创建一个由委托参数调用的回调方法。To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate parameter. 为此, 此`state`参数至少必须包含用于通信的对象。To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the object being used for communication. 如果回调需要更多信息, 你可以创建一个类或结构来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 通过参数将此自定义对象的实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this custom object to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法必须调用方法。Your callback method must invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在发送整个文件或引发异常前阻止。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the entire file or throws an exception. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 尽管适用于面向连接的协议, 但也适用于无连接协议, 前提是你首先调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 在无连接协议的情况下, 你还必须确保文件大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不发送数据报并 引发异常。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到异常, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并连接套接字用于异步通信, 并开始将文件 "test.txt" 异步发送到远程主机。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication and begins sending the file "text.txt" asynchronously to the remote host. 在此示例中, `preBuffer`创建了`postBuffer`一个和一个与文件一起发送的数据, 并使用了默认值。In this example, a `preBuffer` and a `postBuffer` of data is created to send with the file and the default value is used. 回调委托调用来完成传输。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketEnhancements#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketEnhancements#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对`remoteEP`参数中指定的远程主机启动异步发送操作。 The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the `remoteEP` parameter. 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 尽管适用于无连接协议 , 但适用于连接和面向连接的协议。Although intended for connectionless protocols, works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 你可以创建一个实现委托的回调方法, 并将其名称传递给方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此, 你`state`的参数至少必须包含用于通信的已连接或默认值。 To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要更多的信息, 可以创建一个小类来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 通过参数将此类的一个实例传递给方法。 `state`Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用时, 系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法, 并在 发送请求的字节数或引发异常之前阻止。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果希望在调用方法后原始线程会被阻止, 请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 如果希望原始线程继续执行, 请在回调方法中的 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 上调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息, 请参阅将[委托作为回调方法进行封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须先调用、 、 或方法, 否则将引发。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the , , , or method, or will throw a . 将`remoteEP`忽略参数, 并将数据发送到 、 、或方法中建立的。 will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and send data to the established in the , , , or method. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则在调用 之前, 无需使用或方法建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the or method prior to calling . 如果要调用方法, 只需执行此操作。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果在调用 `remoteEP`之前调用了或方法, 则该参数将仅为该发送操作重写指定的默认远程主机。 If you do call the or method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 您也不需要调用方法。You are also not required to call the method. 在这种情况下, 基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的本地网络地址和端口号。In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果希望基础服务提供商选择可用端口, 请使用端口号零。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果需要确定分配的本地网络地址和端口号, 可以在 方法成功完成后使用属性。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 如果要将数据发送到广播地址, 则必须先调用方法, 并将套接字选项设置为。 If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . -还必须确保缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。-You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标志`socketflags`作为参数, 则不会路由要发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步方法缓存执行上下文 (安全上下文、模拟用户和调用上下文)。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 第一次使用特定的上下文 (特定的异步方法、特定的实例和特定的回调) 后, 该上下文的后续使用将会提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将数据异步发送到指定的远程主机。The following code example asynchronously sends data to the specified remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要使用特定的本地终结点, 请使用方法。Use the method if you need to use a specific local endpoint. 必须先调用 , 然后才能调用方法。You must call before you can call the method. 除非需要使用特定的本地终结点, 否则在使用方法之前无需调用。You do not need to call before using the method unless you need to use a specific local endpoint. 可在无连接和面向连接的协议上使用方法。You can use the method on both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 在调用之前, 必须先创建要用于与数据通信的本地。Before calling , you must first create the local from which you intend to communicate data. 如果你不关心分配了哪个本地地址, 则可以使用作为 address 参数创建, 基础服务提供程序将分配最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 如果你有多个网络接口, 这可能有助于简化你的应用程序。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不介意使用哪个本地端口, 则可以使用0作为端口号来创建。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下, 服务提供商将分配介于1024和5000之间的可用端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果使用以上方法, 则可以通过调用来发现分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口号。If you use the above approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by calling the . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则在调用 或方法之前, 将不会返回本地分配的网络地址。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will not return the locally assigned network address until after you have made a call to the or method. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则在完成发送或接收之前, 将无法访问此信息。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you will not have access to this information until you have completed a send or receive. 如果 UDP 套接字希望接收有关接收到的数据包的接口信息 , 则应在调用方法后, 使用套接字选项显式调用此方法。If a UDP socket wants to receive interface information on received packets, the method should be explicitly called with the socket option set to immediately after calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果打算接收多播数据报, 则必须使用多播端口号调用方法。If you intend to receive multicast datagrams, you must call the method with a multicast port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果打算 使用方法接收无连接的数据报, 则必须调用方法。You must call the method if you intend to receive connectionless datagrams using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 调用方法时接收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a when calling the method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用指定的本地终结点绑定。The following code example binds a using the specified local endpoint. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Bind Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Bind Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Bind Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Bind Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Bind Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Bind Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否处于阻止模式。The property indicates whether a is in blocking mode. 如果你处于阻止模式, 并且你进行了一个不会立即完成的方法调用, 则应用程序将在请求的操作完成前阻止执行。If you are in blocking mode, and you make a method call which does not complete immediately, your application will block execution until the requested operation completes. 如果希望继续执行 (即使请求的操作未完成), 请将属性更改为。 `false`If you want execution to continue even though the requested operation is not complete, change the property to `false`. 此属性对异步方法不起作用。The property has no effect on asynchronous methods. 如果要以异步方式发送和接收数据, 并想要阻止执行, 请使用类。If you are sending and receiving data asynchronously and want to block execution, use the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: Closes the connection and releases all associated resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会关闭远程主机连接, 并释放与关联的所有托管资源和非托管资源。 The method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 关闭时, 属性将设置为`false`。Upon closing, the property is set to `false`. 对于面向连接的协议, 建议你在 调用方法之前调用。For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call before calling the method. 这可确保所有数据在连接的套接字关闭之前都已发送和接收。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 如果需要 `false`先调用而不调用,则可以通过将选项设置为并指定非零超时间隔来确保将排队等待传出传输的数据发送。If you need to call without first calling , you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval. 然后将被阻止, 直到发送此数据或指定的超时过期。 will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果将设置为`false`并指定零超时间隔, 则会释放连接并自动丢弃传出的排队数据。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 若要将套接字选项`false`设置为, 请创建, 将 enabled 属性`true`设置为, 并将属性设置为所需的超时时间。To set the socket option to `false`, create a , set the enabled property to `true`, and set the property to the desired time out period. 将此 与套接字选项一起使用来调用方法。Use this along with the socket option to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例关闭。The following code example closes a . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
