remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则属性将 获取, 其中包含连接到的远程 IP 地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the property gets the that contains the remote IP address and port number to which the is connected. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则包含将与之通信的默认远程 IP 地址和端口号。If you are using a connectionless protocol, contains the default remote IP address and port number with which the will communicate. 在检索任何信息 之前, 必须将此转换为。You must cast this to an before retrieving any information. 然后, 可以调用方法来检索远程端口号, 并调用方法来检索远程端口号。You can then call the method to retrieve the remote , and the method to retrieve the remote port number. 在调用 或之后设置。The is set after a call to either or . 如果你之前尝试访问此属性, 将引发。If you try to access this property earlier, will throw a . 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索并显示本地和远程终结点。The following code example retrieves and displays the local and remote endpoints. summary.span: 确定一个或多个套接字的状态。

span.span: Determines the status of one or more sockets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个静态方法, 用于确定一个或多个实例的状态。 is a static method that determines the status of one or more instances. 必须将一个或多个套接字置于中, 然后才能使用方法。You must place one or more sockets into an before you can use the method. 通过调用 作为参数来检查是否有可读性。`checkRead`Check for readability by calling with the as the `checkRead` parameter. 若要查看可写性的套接字, 请`checkWrite`使用参数。To check your sockets for writability, use the `checkWrite` parameter. 对于检测错误条件, 请`checkError`使用。For detecting error conditions, use `checkError`. 调用后 , 将只填充满足条件的那些套接字。After calling , the will be filled with only those sockets that satisfy the conditions. 如果你处于侦听状态, 则可读性意味着对的调用将成功, 而不会受到阻止。If you are in a listening state, readability means that a call to will succeed without blocking. 如果已接受连接, 则可读性意味着数据可用于读取。If you have already accepted the connection, readability means that data is available for reading. 在这些情况下, 所有接收操作都将成功, 但不会被阻止。In these cases, all receive operations will succeed without blocking. 可读性还可指示遥控器是否关闭了连接; 在这种情况下, 对的调用将立即返回, 并返回零个字节。Readability can also indicate whether the remote has shut down the connection; in that case a call to will return immediately, with zero bytes returned. 如果至少有一个感兴趣的套接字`checkRead`(、 `checkWrite`和`checkError`列表中的套接字`microSeconds` ) 满足指定的条件, 或者超出了参数 (以第一个为准), 则返回。 returns when at least one of the sockets of interest (the sockets in the `checkRead`, `checkWrite`, and `checkError` lists) meets its specified criteria, or the `microSeconds` parameter is exceeded, whichever comes first. 设置`microSeconds`为-1 表示无限期超时。Setting `microSeconds` to -1 specifies an infinite time-out. 如果对进行非阻止调用, 则可写性表示已成功连接。If you make a nonblocking call to , writability means that you have connected successfully. 如果已建立连接, 可写性意味着所有发送操作都将成功, 且不会阻止。If you already have a connection established, writability means that all send operations will succeed without blocking. 如果已进行非阻塞调用, 则参数将`checkerror`标识未成功连接的套接字。If you have made a non-blocking call to , the `checkerror` parameter identifies sockets that have not connected successfully. > [!NOTE] > 如果只想确定单个的状态, 请使用方法。Use the method if you only want to determine the status of a single . > [!NOTE] > 此方法无法检测某些类型的连接问题, 例如网络电缆损坏或远程主机已关闭意外。This method cannot detect certain kinds of connection problems, such as a broken network cable, or that the remote host was shut down ungracefully. 您必须尝试发送或接收数据, 以检测这些类型的错误。You must attempt to send or receive data to detect these kinds of errors. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来确定哪些侦听套接字具有连接请求。The following code example uses to determine which listening sockets have a connection request. [!code-cpp[Socket_Select#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Select/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Select/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Select/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数据同步发送到或方法中指定的远程主机, 并返回成功发送的字节数。 synchronously sends data to the remote host specified in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 可用于面向连接的协议和无连接的协议。 can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 此重载需要包含要发送的数据的缓冲区。This overload requires a buffer that contains the data you want to send. 默认值为 0, 缓冲区偏移量默认为 0, 要发送的字节数默认为缓冲区的大小。The value defaults to 0, the buffer offset defaults to 0, and the number of bytes to send defaults to the size of the buffer. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则必须在调用此方法之前调用, 否则将引发。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须使用建立远程主机连接, 或使用来接受传入连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果使用的是无连接协议并计划将数据发送到多个不同的主机, 则应使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use the method. 如果不使用方法, 则必须在每次调用前调用 。If you do not use the method, you will have to call before each call to . 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以通过调用来更改默认远程主机, 然后再调用。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则会一直阻止, 直到发送了缓冲区中的所有字节, 除非使用设置了超时。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until all of the bytes in the buffer are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果超过超时值, 则调用将引发。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在非阻止模式下, 即使发送的字节数小于缓冲区中的字节数, 也可能成功完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes in the buffer. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并在应用程序发送缓冲区中的字节之前重试该操作。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the bytes in the buffer. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在连接的上发送数据。The following code example demonstrates sending data on a connected . [!code-cpp[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数据同步发送到或方法中建立的远程主机, 并返回成功发送的字节数。 synchronously sends data to the remote host established in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 方法可用于面向连接的协议和无连接的协议。The method can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 此重载需要包含要发送的数据的缓冲区和的按位组合。This overload requires a buffer that contains the data you want to send and a bitwise combination of . 缓冲区偏移量默认为 0, 要发送的字节数默认为缓冲区的大小。The buffer offset defaults to 0, and the number of bytes to send defaults to the size of the buffer. 如果将标志指定`socketflags`为参数值, 则将不路由要发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter value, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则必须在调用此方法之前调用, 否则将引发。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须使用建立远程主机连接, 或使用来接受传入连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果使用的是无连接协议并计划将数据发送到多个不同的主机, 则应使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use the method. 如果不使用方法, 则必须在每次调用之前调用方法。If you do not use the method, you will have to call the method before each call to . 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以通过调用来更改默认远程主机, 然后再调用。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则会一直阻止, 直到发送了缓冲区中的所有字节, 除非使用设置了超时。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until all of the bytes in the buffer are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果超过超时值, 则调用将引发。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在非阻止模式下, 即使发送的字节数小于缓冲区中的字节数, 也可能成功完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes in the buffer. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并重试操作, 直到应用程序发送请求的字节数。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 必须确保缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。You must ensure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 如果不使用方法, 则必须在每次调用前调用 。If you do not use the method, you will have to call before each call to . 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以通过调用来更改默认远程主机, 然后再调用。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则会一直阻止, 直到发送了缓冲区中的所有字节, 除非使用设置了超时。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until all of the bytes in the buffer are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果超过超时值, 则调用将引发。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在非阻止模式下, 即使发送的字节数小于缓冲区中的字节数, 也可能成功完成。In non-blocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes in the buffer. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并在应用程序发送缓冲区中的字节之前重试该操作。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the bytes in the buffer. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数据同步发送到或方法中建立的远程主机, 并返回成功发送的字节数。 synchronously sends data to the remote host established in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 可用于面向连接的协议和无连接的协议。 can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 此重载需要包含要发送的数据的缓冲区、要发送的字节数以及任意的按位组合。This overload requires a buffer that contains the data you want to send, the number of bytes you want to send, and a bitwise combination of any . 如果指定标志`socketflags`作为参数, 则不会路由要发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则必须在调用此方法之前调用, 否则将引发。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须使用建立远程主机连接, 或使用来接受传入连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果使用的是无连接协议并计划将数据发送到多个不同的主机, 则应使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use the method. 如果不使用方法, 则必须在每次调用方法之前调用方法。If you do not use the method, you will have to call the method before each call to the method. 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以通过调用来更改默认远程主机, 然后再调用。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 使用面向连接的协议时, 将一直阻止到发送请求的字节数, 除非使用设置了超时值。With a connection-oriented protocol, will block until the requested number of bytes are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果超过超时值, 则调用将引发。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在非阻止模式下, 即使发送的字节数少于你请求的字节数, 也可能成功完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes you request. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并重试操作, 直到应用程序发送请求的字节数。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 必须确保大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。You must ensure that the size does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送缓冲区中找到的数据, 并为 指定。The following code example sends the data found in buffer, and specifies for . remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数据同步发送到或方法中指定的远程主机, 并返回成功发送的字节数。 synchronously sends data to the remote host specified in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 可用于面向连接的协议和无连接的协议。 can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 在此重载中, 如果指定标志`socketflags`作为参数, 则将不路由要发送的数据。In this overload, if you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则必须在调用此方法之前调用 , 否则将引发。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method or will throw a . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须使用建立远程主机连接, 或使用来接受传入连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果你使用的是无连接协议并且打算将数据发送到多个不同的主机, 则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 如果不使用, 则必须在每次调用前调用。If you do not use , you will have to call before each call to . 即使已使用建立默认远程主机, 也可以使用。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以通过调用来更改默认远程主机, 然后再调用。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 您还必须确保大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。You must also be sure that the size does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则会一直阻止到发送请求的字节数, 除非使用设置了超时。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until the requested number of bytes are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果超过超时值, 则调用将引发。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在非阻止模式下, 即使发送的字节数少于你请求的字节数, 也可能成功完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes you request. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并重试操作, 直到应用程序发送请求的字节数。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成发送并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果传输系统中没有可用于保存要传输的数据的缓冲区空间, 则发送将会阻止, 除非已将套接字置于非阻止模式。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例指定了数据缓冲区、偏移量、大小, 以及用于将数据发送到连接的。The following code example specifies the data buffer, an offset, a size, and for sending data to a connected . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从面向连接的套接字上的一个或多个缓冲区写入传出数据。The method is used to write outgoing data from one or more buffers on a connection-oriented socket. 但是, 也可以在连接操作上已指定远程主机的无连接套接字上使用此方法。This method can also be used, however, on connectionless sockets that have specified a remote host on a connect operation. 方法对、 、、、或方法中建立的远程主机启动异步发送操作。 The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , , , or method. 若要成功调用此方法, 必须具有对象上的下列属性和事件:The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - 或 or - 如果设置 if is set - 如果设置 if is set - 调用方可以在 调用方法之前将属性设置为所需的任何用户状态对象, 以便可以在回调方法中检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象更多的信息, 则可以创建一个小类, 以将其他所需的状态信息保存为成员。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果你不首先调用、、、或 ,则此方法将引发异常。The method will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , , or . 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 对于面向消息的套接字, 不要超过底层 Windows 套接字服务提供程序的最大消息大小。For message-oriented sockets, do not exceed the maximum message size of the underlying Windows sockets service provider. 如果数据太长, 无法通过基础服务提供程序以原子方式传递, 则不会传输任何数据, 并且方法会 引发, 并将其设置为本机 Winsock WSAEMSGSIZE 错误代码 (10040)。If the data is too long to pass atomically through the underlying service provider, no data is transmitted and the method throws a with the set to the native Winsock WSAEMSGSIZE error code (10040). 请注意, 成功完成方法并不表示数据已成功传递。Note that the successful completion of the method does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓冲区大小越大, 可能会延迟连接的识别问题。A larger buffer size might delay the recognition of connection difficulties. 如果正在传输大文件, 或者使用的是高带宽、高延迟连接 (如卫星宽带提供程序), 请考虑增加缓冲区大小。Consider increasing the buffer size if you are transferring large files, or you are using a high bandwidth, high latency connection (such as a satellite broadband provider.) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载将文件`fileName`发送到连接的套接字。This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket. `postBuffer` `null`参数默认为(`preBuffer` 0), 且和参数默认为。 `flags`The `flags` parameter defaults to (0), and the `preBuffer` and `postBuffer` parameters default to `null`. 如果`fileName`位于本地目录中, 则只能用文件的名称进行标识; 否则, 必须指定文件的完整路径和名称。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 通配符 (".。。\\\\\\\\\myfile.txt ") 和 UNC 共享名称 (" \shared directory \myfile.txt ")。 \\Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果找不到该文件, 则会引发异常。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. 此方法使用在`TransmitFile` Windows socket 2 API 中找到的函数。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 有关`TransmitFile`函数及其标志的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows 套接字](/windows/desktop/WinSock/)文档。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the [Windows Sockets](/windows/desktop/WinSock/) documentation. 同步地将文件发送到或方法中指定的远程主机。 synchronously sends a file to the remote host specified in the or method. 可用于面向连接的协议和无连接协议。 can be used for both connection-oriented and for connectionless protocols. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则必须在调用此方法之前调用, 否则会引发异常。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, otherwise throws a exception. 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须使用建立远程主机连接或使用接受传入连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则在发送文件之前将阻止。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, blocks until the file is sent. 在非阻止模式下, 可能会在发送整个文件之前成功完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully before the entire file has been sent. 不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并连接套接字, 然后将文件发送到远程主机。The following code example creates and connects a socket and then sends a file to the remote host. 文件 "test.txt" 位于本地计算机的根目录中。The file "test.txt" is located in the root directory of the local machine. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketEnhancements#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketEnhancements#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将文件集合或内存中的数据缓冲区发送到远程主机。The method is used to send a collection of files or in memory data buffers to remote host. 必须已连接到远程主机。The must already be connected to the remote host. 如果引用工作目录中的文件, 则可以只使用文件的名称标识该文件; 否则, 必须指定文件的完整路径和名称。If a references a file in the working directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 支持通配符和 UNC 共享名。Wildcards and UNC share names are supported. 如果找不到该文件, 则将引发。If the file is not found, is thrown. 若要在完成时收到通知, 您必须创建一个实现 EventHandler\ 委托并将回调附加到事件的回调方法。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 参数上的属性为窗口套接字服务提供程序提供有关文件传输的其他信息。 `e`The property on the `e` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the file transfer. 有关如何使用此参数的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 若要成功调用此方法, 必须具有对象上的下列属性和事件:The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - 调用方可以在 调用方法之前将属性设置为所需的任何用户状态对象, 以便可以在回调方法中检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象更多的信息, 则可以创建一个小类, 以将其他所需的状态信息保存为成员。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 此方法使用在 Windows Socket 2 API 中找到的 TransmitPackets 函数。This method uses the TransmitPackets function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 有关 TransmitPackets 函数及其标志的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows 套接字](/windows/desktop/WinSock/)文档。For more information about the TransmitPackets function and its flags, see the [Windows Sockets](/windows/desktop/WinSock/) documentation. 尽管适用于面向连接的协议, 但该方法还适用于无连接协议, 前提是你首先调用、或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, the method also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the , , or method to establish a default remote host. 在无连接协议的情况下, 你还必须确保文件大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不发送数据报并 引发异常。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. 方法根据使用它的操作系统进行了优化。The method is optimized according to the operating system on which it is used. 在 Windows server 版本上, 方法经过优化, 可实现高性能。On Windows server editions, the method is optimized for high performance. 在 Windows 客户端版本上 , 方法针对最小内存和资源利用率进行了优化。On Windows client editions, the method is optimized for minimum memory and resource utilization. 在参数的属性 `e`中使用标志可以提供显著的性能优势。Use of the flag in the property on the `e` parameter can deliver significant performance benefits. 如果启动方法调用的线程正在用于繁重的计算, 则可能会阻止 apc 启动。If the thread initiating the method call is being used for heavy computations, it is possible, though unlikely, that APCs could be prevented from launching. 请注意, 内核模式和用户模式 Apc 之间存在差异。Note that there is a difference between kernel and user-mode APCs. 当线程处于等待状态时, 内核 Apc 启动。Kernel APCs launch when a thread is in a wait state. 当线程处于可报警等待状态时, 用户模式 Apc 启动User-mode APCs launch when a thread is in an alertable wait state

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此重载中, 缓冲区偏移量默认为 0, 发送的字节数默认为`buffer`参数的大小, 值默认为0。In this overload, the buffer offset defaults to 0, the number of bytes to send defaults to the size of the `buffer` parameter, and the value defaults to 0. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则在调用 之前, 不需要使用方法建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the method prior to calling . 如果要调用方法, 只需执行此操作。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果在调用之前调用方法, 则该`remoteEP`参数将仅为该发送操作重写指定的默认远程主机。If you do call the method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 你还不需要调用方法, 因为基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的本地网络地址和端口号。You are also not required to call the method, because the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果需要确定分配的本地网络地址和端口号, 可以在 方法成功完成后使用属性。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 尽管适用于无连接协议 , 但也适用于面向连接的协议。Although intended for connectionless protocols, also works with connection-oriented protocols. 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须先通过调用方法建立远程主机连接, 或使用方法接受传入的连接请求。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming connection request using the method. 如果未建立或接受远程主机连接, 将引发。If you do not establish or accept a remote host connection, will throw a . 还可以在调用方法之前, 为无连接协议建立默认远程主机。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在这两种情况下 , 将`remoteEP`忽略参数, 且仅向已连接或默认的远程主机发送数据。In either of these cases, will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only send data to the connected or default remote host. 在发送缓冲区中的所有字节之前, 阻止套接字将会阻止。Blocking sockets will block until the all of the bytes in the buffer are sent. 由于非阻止会立即完成, 因此它可能不会发送`buffer`中的所有字节。Since a nonblocking completes immediately, it might not send all of the bytes in the `buffer`. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并重试操作, 直到应用程序发送中`buffer`的所有字节。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends all of the bytes in the `buffer`. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集大量传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. 如果在阻止模式下使用无连接协议, 则会一直阻止, 直到发送数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol in blocking mode, will block until the datagram is sent. 如果要将数据发送到广播地址, 则必须先调用方法, 并将套接字选项设置为。 If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . 还必须确保发送的字节数不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。You must also be sure that the number of bytes sent does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将无连接数据报发送到指定的远程主机。The following code example sends a connectionless datagram to the specified remote host. [!code-cpp[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此重载中, 缓冲区偏移量默认为0。In this overload, the buffer offset defaults to 0. 如果指定标志`socketflags`作为参数, 则不会路由要发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则在调用 之前, 不需要使用方法建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the method prior to calling . 如果要调用方法, 只需执行此操作。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果在调用之前调用方法, 则该`remoteEP`参数将仅为该发送操作重写指定的默认远程主机。If you do call the method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 你还不需要调用方法, 因为基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的本地网络地址和端口号。You are also not required to call the method, because the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果需要确定分配的本地网络地址和端口号, 可以在 方法成功完成后使用属性。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 尽管适用于无连接协议 , 但也适用于面向连接的协议。Although intended for connectionless protocols, also works with connection-oriented protocols. 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须先通过调用方法建立远程主机连接, 或使用方法接受传入的连接请求。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming connection request using the method. 如果未建立或接受远程主机连接, 将引发。If you do not establish or accept a remote host connection, will throw a . 还可以在调用方法之前, 为无连接协议建立默认远程主机。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在这两种情况下 , 将`remoteEP`忽略参数, 且仅向已连接或默认的远程主机发送数据。In either of these cases, will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only send data to the connected or default remote host. 阻止套接字将会阻止, 直到发送请求的字节数。Blocking sockets will block until the requested number of bytes are sent. 由于非阻止会立即完成, 因此它可能不会在单个操作中发送所有请求的字节。Since a nonblocking completes immediately, it might not send all of the bytes requested in a single operation. 应用程序负责跟踪发送的字节数, 并重试操作, 直到应用程序发送请求的字节数。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 还不能保证发送的数据会立即显示在网络上。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 为了提高网络效率, 基础系统可能会延迟传输, 直到收集了大量的传出数据。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of out-going data is collected. 此方法成功完成意味着基础系统具有空间来缓冲用于网络发送的数据。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. 如果在阻止模式下使用无连接协议, 则会一直阻止, 直到发送数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol in blocking mode, will block until the datagram is sent. 如果要将数据发送到广播地址, 则必须先调用方法, 并将套接字选项设置为。 If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . 还必须确保发送的字节数不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。You must also be sure that the number of bytes sent does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . > [!NOTE] > 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将无连接数据报发送到指定的远程主机。The following code example sends a connectionless datagram to the specified remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对`e`参数的属性中指定的远程主机启动异步发送操作。 The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the property of the `e` parameter. 通过调用方法, 可以在单独的执行线程中发送数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 尽管此方法用于无连接协议, 但适用于无连接和面向连接的协议。Although this method is intended for connectionless protocols, works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 若要在完成时收到通知, 您必须创建一个实现 EventHandler\ 委托并将回调附加到事件的回调方法。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 若要成功调用此方法, 必须具有对象上的下列属性和事件:The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - - - - 调用方可以在 调用方法之前将属性设置为所需的任何用户状态对象, 以便可以在回调方法中检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象更多的信息, 则可以创建一个小类, 以将其他所需的状态信息保存为成员。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则必须先调用 、 、、、或方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the , , , , , or method. 否则 将引发。Otherwise will throw a . 使用面向连接的协议时, 方法将忽略属性, 并将数据发送到在、 、、或方法。When using a connection-oriented protocol, the method will ignore the property and send data to the established in the , , , , , or method. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则不需要在调用前使用、 或方法建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the , , or method prior to calling . 仅当要调用或方法时, 才需要执行此操作。You only need to do this if you intend to call the or methods. 如果在调用 之前调用了、或方法, 则该属性将替代仅用于该发送操作的指定的默认远程主机。 If you do call the , , or method prior to calling , the property will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 您也不需要调用方法。You are also not required to call the method. 在这种情况下, 基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的本地网络 IP 地址和端口号。In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network IP address and port number. 如果希望基础服务提供商选择可用端口, 请使用端口号零。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果需要确定分配的本地网络 IP 地址和端口号, 可以在 事件终止后使用属性, 并调用关联的委托。If you need to identify the assigned local network IP address and port number, you can use the property after the event is signaled and the associated delegates are called. 如果要将数据发送到广播地址, 则必须先调用方法, 并将 socket 选项设置为 true。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option for to true. 还必须确保缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果在属性中指定 DontRoute 标志, 则将不路由要发送的数据。If you specify the DontRoute flag in the property, the data you are sending will not be routed. 对于面向消息的套接字, 必须注意不要超出基础传输的最大消息大小。For message-oriented sockets, care must be taken not to exceed the maximum message size of the underlying transport. 如果缓冲区的大小超过了基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小, 则不会发送数据报并将引发。If the size of the buffer exceeds the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider, the datagram is not sent and will throw a . 成功完成方法并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a method does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.

param.name: level
param.span: 要为此套接字设置的 IP 保护级别。

span.span: The IP protection level to set on this socket.

summary.span: 设置套接字的 IP 保护级别。

span.span: Set the IP protection level on a socket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法, 可以限制 IPv6 或 IP 套接字侦听指定的作用域, 如具有相同链接本地或站点本地前缀的地址。The method enables restricting an a IPv6 or IP socket to listen on a specified scope, such as addresses with the same link local or site local prefix. 此套接字选项使应用程序可以对 IPv6 或 IP 套接字设置访问限制。This socket option enables applications to place access restrictions on IPv6 or IP sockets. 通过应用此类限制，可让在专用局域网上运行的应用程序能够通过简单的方式很好地增强自身的安全性，以便防范外部攻击。Such restrictions enable an application running on a private LAN to simply and robustly harden itself against external attacks. 如果`level`将参数设置为, 还可以使用此套接字选项来删除访问限制。This socket option can also be used to remove access restrictions if the `level` parameter is set to . 此套接字选项可以扩大或缩小侦听套接字的范围，从而使得公共用户和私人用户可以在适当情况下对站点进行无限制的访问，或者可以根据需要对同一站点进行有限制的访问。This socket option widens or narrows the scope of a listening socket, enabling unrestricted access from public and private users when appropriate, or restricting access only to the same site, as required. 此套接字选项具有 枚举中指定的已定义保护级别。This socket option has defined protection levels specified in the enumeration. 方法用于启用或禁用实例的网络地址遍历 (NAT)。 The method is used to enable or disable Network Address Traversal (NAT) for a instance. 可以使用 Teredo、6to4 或 ISATAP 隧道来提供 NAT 遍历。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 当参数设置为或时 , 这会显式禁用实例的 NAT 遍历。 `level`When the `level` parameter is set to , or , this explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 当参数设置为时, 这可能会允许 NAT 遍历系统上的防火墙规则。 `level`When the `level` parameter is set to , this may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system.

span.span: The parameter cannot be .

span.span: The IP protection level cannot be set to unspecified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选项确定当前的行为。 options determine the behavior of the current . 设置`optionValue`为`true`以启用选项, 或`false`设置为以禁用选项。Set `optionValue` to `true` to enable the option, or to `false` to disable the option. 按协议支持级别对选项进行分组。 options are grouped by level of protocol support. 下面列出了可使用此重载设置的各种选项。Listed below are the various options that can be set using this overload. 这些选项按适当的值进行分组。These options are grouped by the appropriate value. 如果要设置这些选项中的任何一个, 请确保为 `optionLevel`参数使用适当的值。If you intend to set any of these options, be sure to use the appropriate value for the `optionLevel` parameter. 您选择设置的选项必须在`optionName`参数中指定。The option you choose to set must be specified in the `optionName` parameter. 如果要获取所列出的任何选项的当前值, 请使用方法。If you want to get the current value of any of the options listed, use the method. 可使用此重载设置的选项。 options that can be set using this overload. - - - - - - - 可使用此重载设置的选项。 options that can be set using this overload. - - - 可使用此重载设置的选项。 options that can be set using this overload. - - - 可使用此重载设置的选项。 options that can be set using this overload. - 有关这些选项的详细信息, 请参阅枚举。For more information on these options, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到异常, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开套接字, 并启用`DontLinger` `OutOfBandInline`和套接字选项。The following code example opens a socket and enables the `DontLinger` and the `OutOfBandInline` socket options. param.name: how
param.span: 值之一，它指定不再允许执行的操作。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the operation that will no longer be allowed.

summary.span: 禁用某 上的发送和接收。

span.span: Disables sends and receives on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用面向连接的时, 请始终在关闭 之前调用方法。When using a connection-oriented , always call the method before closing the . 这可确保所有数据在连接的套接字关闭之前都已发送和接收。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 调用方法以释放与关联的所有托管资源和非托管资源。 Call the method to free all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 不要尝试在关闭后使用。Do not attempt to reuse the after closing. 下表显示了`how`对参数有效的枚举值。The following table shows the enumeration values that are valid for the `how` parameter. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |发送Send|禁止在此上发送。Disable sending on this .| |接收Receive|禁止在此上接收。Disable receiving on this .| |双向Both|在此上禁用发送和接收。Disable both sending and receiving on this .| 设置`how` 为指定不允许对的后续调用。Setting `how` to specifies that subsequent calls to are not allowed. 如果使用的是无连接的, 则指定将不起作用。If you are using a connectionless , specifying will have no effect. 设置`how` 为指定不允许对的后续调用。Setting `how` to specifies that subsequent calls to are not allowed. 这在较低的协议层上不起作用。This has no effect on lower protocol layers. 如果使用面向连接的协议, 则在调用以下任一条件后, 将终止连接:If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the connection is terminated if either of the following conditions exist after a call to : - 数据位于传入网络缓冲区中等待接收。Data is in the incoming network buffer waiting to be received. - 已到达更多数据。More data has arrived. 如果使用的是无连接协议, 则接受并排队数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol, datagrams are accepted and queued. 但是, 如果没有可用于附加传入数据报的缓冲区空间, 则将丢弃这些数据, 并且不会将错误返回给发件人。However, if no buffer space is available for additional incoming datagrams, they will be discarded and no error will be returned to the sender. 不建议在无连接上使用。Using on a connectionless is not recommended. 按如上所述`how`禁用发送和接收的设置。Setting `how` to disables both sends and receives as described above. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 调用方法时接收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a when calling the method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来禁用。The following code example uses to disable the . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: void IDisposable.Dispose ();
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed
Sub Dispose () Implements IDisposable.Dispose
virtual void System.IDisposable.Dispose() = IDisposable::Dispose;

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完后, 调用 IDisposable。Call IDisposable.Dispose when you are finished using the . IDisposable 方法会使处于不可用状态。The IDisposable.Dispose method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 IDisposable 之后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 这样垃圾回收器才能收回占用的内存。 After calling IDisposable.Dispose, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在释放对的最后一个引用之前, 请始终调用 IDisposable。Always call IDisposable.Dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指定 发送的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包的生存时间 (TTL) 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the Time To Live (TTL) value of Internet Protocol (IP) packets sent by the .

value.span: TTL 值。

span.span: The TTL value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TTL 值表示在路由器丢弃数据包并且 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) "超过 TTL" 错误消息返回给发件人之前, 数据包可以遍历的路由器的最大数目。The TTL value indicates the maximum number of routers the packet can traverse before the router discards the packet and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) "TTL exceeded" error message is returned to the sender. TTL 值可以设置为0到255之间的值。The TTL value may be set to a value from 0 to 255. 如果未设置此属性, 则套接字的默认 TTL 值为32。When this property is not set, the default TTL value for a socket is 32. 如果使用套接字建立成功的连接, 则 TCP/IP 堆栈将忽略对传输控制协议 (TCP) 套接字设置此属性。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket is ignored by the TCP/IP stack if a successful connection has been established using the socket. 如果收到, 请使用属性获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后, 请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档, 以获取有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CS/class1.cs#1)]
